name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Basic principles of fluid dynamics and their application to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory
lessons.description: Understanding airfoil design and its impact on lift and drag.

lessons.name: Boundary Layer Theory
lessons.description: Exploration of boundary layer behavior in aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Analysis of subsonic flow behavior and its applications.

lessons.name: Transonic and Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Study of flow behavior at and beyond the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Fans
lessons.description: Understanding the formation and effects of shock waves and expansion fans.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in High-Speed Flow
lessons.description: Principles of heat transfer in high-speed aerodynamic environments.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Design and analysis of thermal protection systems for aerospace vehicles.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Aerothermodynamics
lessons.description: Study of aerodynamic heating in hypersonic flight regimes.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Structural Loads
lessons.description: Analysis of various loads experienced by spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Materials for Space Applications
lessons.description: Selection and properties of materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Techniques
lessons.description: Methods for analyzing and optimizing spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws and Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of orbital motion and orbital elements.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers
lessons.description: Techniques for changing orbits and planning space missions.

lessons.name: Interplanetary Trajectories
lessons.description: Design and analysis of trajectories for interplanetary missions.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Design and operation of spacecraft power generation and distribution systems.

lessons.name: Attitude Determination and Control
lessons.description: Principles of spacecraft attitude determination and control systems.

lessons.name: Communication Systems
lessons.description: Design and operation of spacecraft communication systems.

name: Organic Compounds and Structures
description: Introduction to organic compounds and their structures.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Study of hydrocarbon structures and properties.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Identification and properties of functional groups in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Understanding spatial arrangements of atoms in molecules.

name: Organic Reactions and Mechanisms
description: Study of organic reactions and their mechanisms.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Mechanisms and applications of substitution reactions in organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Understanding elimination reactions and their importance in organic synthesis.

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Study of addition reactions in organic chemistry.

name: Spectroscopic Methods in Organic Chemistry
description: Application of spectroscopic techniques in organic structure determination.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Principles and applications of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy.

lessons.name: Infrared Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Understanding and interpreting infrared spectra of organic compounds.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Application of mass spectrometry in organic structure elucidation.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of coordination compounds and their properties.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding the bonding in coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Coordination Geometries
lessons.description: Study of different geometries in coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Isomerism in Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Understanding different types of isomerism in coordination chemistry.

name: Organometallic Chemistry
description: Introduction to organometallic compounds and their applications.

lessons.name: Metal-Carbon Bonds
lessons.description: Study of the nature and properties of metal-carbon bonds.

lessons.name: Organometallic Catalysis
lessons.description: Applications of organometallic compounds in catalysis.

lessons.name: Organometallic Reactions
lessons.description: Study of important reactions in organometallic chemistry.

name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: Study of inorganic elements in biological systems.

lessons.name: Metalloproteins
lessons.description: Study of proteins containing metal ions and their functions.

lessons.name: Oxygen Transport and Storage
lessons.description: Understanding the role of iron in oxygen transport and storage.

lessons.name: Electron Transfer in Biological Systems
lessons.description: Study of electron transfer processes in biological systems.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Study of heat and energy transfer in chemical systems.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Understanding the fundamental laws of thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Thermochemistry
lessons.description: Study of heat changes in chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Phase Equilibria
lessons.description: Understanding phase transitions and equilibria.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: Introduction to quantum mechanical principles in chemistry.

lessons.name: Wave Functions and the Schr√∂dinger Equation
lessons.description: Understanding the basic principles of quantum mechanics.

lessons.name: Particle in a Box
lessons.description: Study of the simplest quantum mechanical model.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbital Theory
lessons.description: Application of quantum mechanics to molecular systems.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Rate Laws
lessons.description: Understanding the mathematical description of reaction rates.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Study of the steps involved in chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: Understanding the role of catalysts in chemical reactions.
